SUPPORTING RURAL VETERANS: Veterans should have access to quality care, no matter where they live. I'm fighting to protect access to Community-Based Outpatient Clinics and ensure local clinics have the resources to serve rural veterans at home in their communities. ‚¨áÔ∏è

CONNECTING VETS WITH RESOURCES, SUPPORT: Our veterans put everything on the line to serve our country & we must ensure they have the resources and support they need when they return home - like access to safe, affordable housing, counseling services, & disability compensation. ‚¨áÔ∏è

CREATING OPPORTUNITY: I'm working on the @VetAffairsDems Economic Opportunity Subcommittee to ensure Upstate NY veterans have the tools & resources they need to get a college degree, complete an apprenticeship, start a small business, or pursue other career opportunities. ‚¨áÔ∏è

IMPROVING VETERANS‚Äô HEALTH CARE: I'm working to ensure the VA provides the best care & will hold them accountable if they fall short. I'm also focused on improving mental health programs to reduce the rate of veteran suicide & ensure all vets know they have a place to turn. ‚¨áÔ∏è

Our veterans deserve access to the best jobs, education, health care, & services. Today I released ‚ÄúServing Upstate NY Veterans‚Äù - my plan to improve vets‚Äô health care, increase economic opportunity, & connect veterans with the resources and services they need. Keep reading ‚¨áÔ∏è pic.twitter.com/97dg9sStEh

In Congress and on the @HouseAgDems Committee, I am fighting for the needs of the hardworking Upstate New Yorkers. Read "Working for Rural New York" here  ‚û°Ô∏è  http://bit.ly/RuralNY¬† pic.twitter.com/zmeUlGKDBK

IMPROVING HEALTH CARE IN RURAL NY: Quality, affordable health care should be available no matter your zip code. I‚Äôm working to cut burdensome taxes, like the health insurance tax, and ensure farmers have the critical mental health resources they need. ‚¨áÔ∏è

CONNECTING RURAL NY: From crumbling roads and bridges to slow internet speeds, we must do more to connect rural NY with info & services. I'm working to improve broadband resources, hold cable & internet companies accountable, & prioritize bipartisan infrastructure legislation. ‚¨áÔ∏è

FIGHTING FOR LOCAL FARMERS AND PRODUCERS: Agriculture is a huge driver of #NY22's economy, supporting nearly 7,000 jobs. I set up an Agriculture Advisory Council to hear directly from Upstate New York farmers and ensure they have what they need to succeed. ‚¨áÔ∏è

THREAD: Too often, our rural communities are left behind by a broken system that puts politics over solutions.
